name: Climber
description:
The wide screen version of Climber for the Game and Watch.

Climber is a Game & Watch video game released in the Crystal Screen format in 1986 and the New Wide Screen format in 1988. The game was never released in Japan, and an estimated 250,000 of the New Wide Screen version were produced by Nintendo. The model number for the original Crystal Screen version is DR-802, while the model number for the this version is DR-106. Some speculate that the game is based on the Ice Climber NES game, though this is unconfirmed.

In Climber, you are a child known as Climber who, with the help of Lord Meiji's teachings, jumps across platforms trying to get to the top of Block Mountain while avoiding enemies and platforms that move. The enemies are the Blockmen, which walk and turn into block platforms when they reach a gap; Eyerom, birds that fly and get in the Climber's way; and thorny plants, which are obstacles in the way of Climber's movements. In each set of 5 levels, the first 4 ends with a bonus game where Climber has 2 chances to time his jump to catch Hentori, the bonus bird. On the fifth level, Climber must jump and grab the sword at the correct time to stab and defeat Dragalo the dragon.

name: So Below

A new beginning calls Anita Carver to another city, a new place to live, forget and grow. With all her familial and relationship traumas, getting used to this new life will be difficult. But company is right around the corner, be it good, evil or supernatural.

She is not sure what awaits in Holmes Hideway, but the unseen might have been waiting for her all this time.

name: Phantom of the Black Rose Revue
description:
1974. Hyogo Prefecture, Japan.

The Black Rose Revue, an all-female musical theater troupe steeped in tradition and high esteem, has a new star on the rise. Twenty-two year old Chihiro Sato has quickly become the newest sensation for fans of the Revue. Sweet yet determined, Chihiro is ready to chase her dream: become the most famous musumeyaku in Japan.

But the theater, a sanctuary of glamour and brilliance, cradles shadows within its embrace. The corridors buzz with whispers of ghostly apparitions and ominous shadows, intensifying backstage tensions. As Chihiro steps deeper into the limelight, mysterious, increasingly obsessive letters begin to adorn her vanity, which grow steadily more obsessive with every message sent.

Will you sculpt a destiny steeped in unparalleled fame? Embark on a romance that will be sung through the ages? Or unearth secrets draped in shadows, whispering of forbidden truths? The threads of fate are in your hands, waiting to be woven into the tapestry of the unknown…

name: Mansion 2

Only you can find the answers to these questions.

Your actions have consequences. Take a moral stand and fight for the pacifist way or indulge in your deep desires and walk the path of the antagonist. Either path includes a plethora of useful spells, upgrades and abilities.

name: Broad Sword
description:
Broad Sword is a formation based third-person tactical hack and slash game where you lead formations of troops to face off against a variety of factions in a fantasy realm. Engage in class-based combat as you defeat your foes in conquest, siege and campaign modes.

Fight from a ground level view of large fantasy battles, command your formation of troops, and lead your army through hack-and-slash encounters to claim ultimate victory! Go head to head in objective based conquest mode. Test your defensive skills in a wave based survival mode, or employ grand strategy in a campaign mode. Varied troop types offer distinct fighting styles and weapons, allowing for diverse playstyles and tactics. Will you anchor a battle line with spearmen, shatter defenses with mighty great swords, or rain arrows upon your enemies?

description: Single player simple horror game, inspired by "Iron Lung"

name: Signal
description: Signal is a third-person adventure game full of unknowns and dangers, where the player takes on the role of a father searching for his daughter, facing extreme life and death decisions, the player must rise to the challenge of finding clues and solving puzzles in order to have a chance of survival.

name: AcShooting
description: A 2D action and shooting game created by students. The key is the shape of the main character!

name: Summoners Defense
description: The game features an array of summoning spells, each with distinct strengths and weaknesses. From nimble archers and mighty golems to elemental spirits. As you progress, you'll unlock new spells and master advanced summoning techniques, increasing your arsenal of defenders.

name: Tiny Breakers Camp
description: It is time for true heroes to stop an evil invasion that is spreading across our land. Face enemies from the deepest caves and dungeons in an engaging brick-breaker style of fight. Bring peace and justice to your homeland yet again.

name: The Mouse Game
description: Run from robot vacuums, dodge electric wires and mouse traps, and avoid flames and lasers to secure the cheese! Can you beat all 35 levels of this hardcore maze game?

name: Polygon Fantasy Battle Simulator
description: Welcome to Polygon Fantasy Battle Simulator, the most colorful medieval fantasy battle simulator in existence! Throw tens of thousands of soldiers into battle, enjoy the show, or take direct control of one of them to prove your valor!

name: Atomic Hazard
description: Atomic Hazard is a action puzle platformer. Take advantage of your environment in physics-based movement and combat.

name: Adventurer's Gambit: Dungeons of Fortune
description: Ascend the Tower! Create your hero, enter the endlessly varied dungeons alone, or team up with up to 3 friends to battle against 18 foes! Prevail by blade, magic, or curse... or join the bones rattling amidst the rubble. Are you up to the challenge? The Tower awaits!

name: Zombie Death Day
description: Battle for survival against zombie hordes. This FPS puts you at the frontline of the battle to repel the hordes, and save the human race. Lead the fight by destroying the infected.

name: Favela Zombie Shooter
description: Favela Zombie Shooter is a wave-based action shooter, where you have to defeat different types of zombies in a Brazilian Favela. Survive zombie waves, earn money and get better weapons to survive longer!

name: Deep Space Tavern
description: Deep Space Tavern is a playful fusion of management and clicker gameplay. Design your tavern, attract patrons from across the system, and master the art of keeping them happy and safe. Experience the joy of management without all the hassle!

name: Windwalker
description: Windwalker is a 3d turn-based RPG where players collect loot from combat and other encounters to cleanse the plague stirring in the fantastical world of Qubis. Fight against unique monsters with thousands of unique items and acquire powerful pets to fight alongside you.

name: Age
description: This is a happy game.

name: The Amnesiac: Final Chapter
description: "The Amnesiac:Final Chapter" is a story-based text game set in a low-magic world. In a crumbling baron's castle, a banquet takes an unexpected turn with the baron's death and everyone's amnesia. Players choose from 10 amnesiacs to uncover their individual stories.

name: Tokeis
description: Tokeis is a board-like real-time city builder about growing your town from a tiny tile to a hexagonal empire. Collect tokens, manage resources, reorganize inefficiencies, and fortify your economy. Handle the harsh weather and defend against raiders trying to steal your riches!

name: Schlosshelden
description: Sin descripción

name: Run Ran! Side Scrollers
description: Random stage generation. The length of the stages can be freely determined. You can freely decide the length of each stage, so you can play quickly in your spare time or take your time. Enjoy always fresh play and challenge your own limits in Time Attack.

name: Beyond the Oaks
description: Trapped in Canada's boreal forest, in which futuristic technology and otherworldly horrors surround a 17th Century village, you must unravel the mystical open world's secrets in this third-person action-adventure game.

name: Dracula's Prey: A Nightmare in Rome
description: In this gloomy and mystifying first-person 2D horror game, help Sherlock Holmes chase down the murderous Count Dracula in the city of Rome! Over 7 nights, survive the unfolding nightmare in this world of creepy hand-drawn animations!

name: Arthur's Reading Race
description: Arthur’s Reading Race centers around everyone’s favorite Aardvark. Arthur is trying to teach his little sister, D.W, to read. However, she insists that she already knows how!

name: Labyrinth
description: Labyrinth is a 2D platformer with pixel art graphics in which you will have to find your way through intricate labyrinths, overcome many enemies and deadly traps.

name: Project Warlock: Lost Chapters
description: Next Chapter of Project Warlock is here. A retro fps shooter that honors the legacy of classic shooters like Doom, Wolfenstein and Hexen picks up the story of Warlock mixing frantic gunplay, with powerful magic spells and perks and skills based character customisation.

name: Don't Destroy Your Friends
description: In this silly online cooperative game with birds, puzzles, and minigames, you'll work together with your friends to overcome any obstacle. But watch out! You will fail or succeed as one.

name: Bumpkin and Sprout
description: Embark on an unforgettable 3D platformer adventure in "Bumpkin & Sprout," where action, humor, and environmental awareness unite! Join these two whimsical mushrooms on a mission to save not only themselves but also Nature herself from the clutches of the nefarious Pollution Spirit.

name: Escape!
description: A sci-fi based puzzle platform strategy game. Third person action adventure where you need to use your wits and skills to overcome deadly obstacles and complete the goals. Can you Escape?

name: Beta Max
description: Use four-dimensional thinking to manipulate time and navigate through this mind bending retro inspired realm. Solve puzzles to help Max find his way home in this atmospheric first-person puzzle platformer.

name: Blocks and Bones
description: Blocks and Bones is a zombie wave shooter with endless hordes of the undead in custom maps built by players. Build mode is the sandbox side of the game where you build levels from blocks and publish them online in-game so other players can survive the apocalypse inside your chilling creations.

name: Arthur's Computer Adventure
description: Explore Marc Brown’s classic "Arthur’s Computer Adventure"! Arthur and his friends bring the story alive one word at a time, fully animated and voiced. Increase the challenge and the fun with an interactive at-your-own-pace option with lots of bonuses and secrets to discover!

name: Living Dolls Rebirth Alpha
description: Welcome in this fantasy Adult world. Enjoy and explore this world and its inhabitants freely! This open world for PC will blow your mind!

name: Draft Day Sports: Pro Football 2024
description: Draft Day Sports: Pro Football 2024 puts you in the role of general manager of your favorite football team. Every decision can be made by you from drafting, trading, signing free agents right down to creating and calling your own plays to lead your team to championship glory and becoming a dynasty.

name: Hell Hunter: Anti-Nomen
description: A story driven adventure horror audiogame in which you have to interact with room elements, survive to environment gimmicks and fight real time battles based only on stereo audio. Learn the enemy patterns and hear where the attacks come from to dodge their attacks in time and then attack.

name: The Soul of Too Birds Game
description: Destroy all art. Free the soul.

name: Marchenkanna
description: A free RPG that lets you travel through a world with a picture book-like ambience. The story takes place in a peaceful world where wizards live. In battle scenes, a unique system allows you to specify the shape of attacks according to the enemy's position. Fun for everyone from beginners to gamers!

name: Scram: Scrammer's Pack
description: Elevate your gaming presence with the "Scrammer's Pack" DLC, where awesome hats and expressive customization options await, ensuring your virtual adventures are as unique as you are.

name: Incaved Runner
description: Escape a concealed, mutated monster disrupting your scavenging. Master the running, jumping, swinging, shooting and combining upgrades to end up becoming the poweful beast you initially feared, turning the cave system from a nightmarish hollow into a playground.

name: Machine Fable
description: Machine Fable is a modern Turned based RPG, with exploration, puzzle, and story rich elements, Smoof 8-Bit soundtrack, and a hand-drawn shiddy art style. It's funny, dumb, and sometimes plain stoopids, because "video game logic" you know, but at the same time brilliant...you know...know what I mean.

name: The Wicked Souls
description: The Wicked Souls is a Metroidvania with a strong focus on an exciting and imaginative story. Explore the mysterious tower in the afterlife with the postman Bones and his mischievous companion Dietrich and uncover its secrets.

name: Astral Party
description: 'Astral Party' is a party game supports online multiplayer with up to 4 players. Choose your favorite character, utilize their skills and cards to fight against your friends. A myriad of events lends an air of unpredictability to the game. Come on, join the 'friend' journey with your buddies!

name: Pixel Piracy Online
description: Pirate MMO RPG that has it all. You will play alone or with friends any way you want: build the world, gather resources, farm, socialize, pillage, level up, min-max, loot, craft, survive, etc. One big dynamic, persistent world.

name: Forwards
description: An experiential linear narrative walking sim.

name: Friend Ship
description: A two-player action shooting game created by students. Survive the onslaught of sharks approaching from 360° with cooperative play!

name: Overwatch 2: Season 7 - Rise of the Darkness
description: Get ready for the spookiest event of the year, as Overwatch 2 transforms into a haunted battleground. Halloween Terror is back with your favorite game modes - Junkenstein's Revenge and Wrath of the Bride and a new Events Shop to spend Overwatch Credits on limited-time skins, emotes, and highlight intros.

name: Express Hero
description:
Express Hero is a fun and engaging game that will test your problem-solving and time-management skill

Get ready to embark on the ultimate transportation adventure! In Express Hero, your goal is to navigate an intricate network of taxis, trains, and airplanes to reach your destination as quickly as possible. With each level, the challenge increases as roads, tracks, and air routes twist and turn, making it tricky to figure out the fastest way to travel. Can you master the maze of transportation and become the ultimate Express Hero?

name: Furry Necromancer
description: You died, but I got good news and bad news for you. The good news - you have been resurrected, the bad news - you have been resurrected by a necromancer who has some "special" plans for you (although it might not be "bad news" at all...)

name: Laruaville 9
description: Use your Match 3 skills to build an empire! As usually there are also some optional bonus game and a town to build!

name: 31-in-1 Mighty Mix
description:
An unlicensed collection by developer Sachen, consisting of these games:
THUNDER BLASTER MAN
JURASSIC BOY 2
STREET RIDER
BOMB DISPOSER
DAN LASER (untagged)
VEX BLOCK
EXPLOSIVEW BRICK 99 (untagged)
SMALL GORILLA (untagged)
TRAP & TURN
PILE WONDER
ARCTIC ZONE
ZOO BLOCK (untagged)
MAGIC TOWER
VIRUS ATTACK
ELECTRON WORLD
TROUBLE ZONE
DICE SQUARE
RAILWAY
WORM VISITOR
2ND SPACE
BLACK FOREST TALE
A-FORCE
SKY ACE
WAR FLEA (untagged)
CRAZY BURGER (untagged)
DEEP (untagged)
ZIP BALL
PUPPET KNIGHT
CAPTAIN KNICK-KNACK ANT SOLDIER
DUCK ADVENTURES

name: Asteroids ++
description: Asteroids ++ is the best Asteroids clone you will ever play in your life. Customize your spaceship with your weapon loadout, save your solar system, and destroy those damn Asteroids! And remember, you can never end Asteroid genocide!

name: Gunslinger Duel
description: Engage in turn-based quick draw battles against increasingly formidable opponents. Choose your next move, then in third person, draw and fire before your opponent does! An arcade-style strategy game in the Wild West. Are you a real gunslinger survivor, or another yellow-belly about to hit the dirt?

name: Many Eyed
description: These dark and desolate woods appear abandoned. Can you still hear the whispers of its missing hikers? They ache for you to investigate.

name: Rich Everyone
description: The game simulates the life restoration of ancient Chinese farmers in scientific farming, vegetable planting, animal husbandry, and various handicraft workshops. Free simulation construction.

name: Intravenous 2
description: Intravenous 2 is the ultimate blend of tactical gameplay and immersive storytelling. Will you embrace the shadows or confront your foes head-on? The choice is yours. Experience a new era of tactical stealth action. Save lives. Uncover secrets. Take vengeance.

name: World of Yggdrasil
description: Become emperor, criminal or merchant in the world of Yggdrasil... Choose your path in the world of Yggdrasil!

name: Partizan
description: Partizan is a brutal and satisfying action-oriented immersive sim set in a brutalist dystopia ruled by a oppressive regime. Rip and tear through militias, bureaucrats and gunked up quarantine zones until the world knows your name.

name: Jennifer's Fragments
description: Jennifer is trying to piece together her fragmented life amidst the games of her mind. Help Jennifer piece together her memories in dark, uncanny and mysterious places. Get ready for a journey of terrible secrets and traumas.

name: Monster Traveler
description: Monster Traveler is a Strategy game, published by Taito Corporation, which was released in Japan in 2002.

name: Network Adventure Bugsite: Beta
description: Network Adventure Bugsite is a monster training Game Boy Color game exclusive to Japan. It was released in two versions, Alpha and Beta. It is an RPG where players enter a virtual world known as Bugsite which is filled with "Bugs". Bugs act as virtual pets and can be used to battle other players.

name: All-Star Baseball 2000
description:
The Game Boy Color port of All-Star Baseball 2000

All-Star Baseball 2000 is the second release in the series and includes a range of improvements and new features compared to the '99 version. Motion captured technology allows a realistic representation of player movements, swings, throws and catches. Apart from the improved roster management, which includes the ability to sign players from the minor league and create new players with new stats, you are able to play a 162 game inter-league season or complete the 1999 MLB scheduled season.
Once more there are 30 teams available in the game, as well as home stadiums and home or away jerseys. Additionally players' face sizes and play styles coincide with the real ones, since the game is licensed.

name: Asterix & Obelix take on Caesar
description:
The Game Boy Color port of Asterix & Obelix take on Ceasar.

Asterix & Obelix take on Caesar is an action video game based on the film of the same name.

name: Panzer Corps 2: Axis Operations - 1946
description: It is said that every end is a new beginning. And while we all know the Second World War ended in 1945, Panzer Corps 2 is making the unprecedented leap to continue the Axis Operations with one final, grand installment.

name: Delicious: Cooking and Romance
description: Join Emily & her family in a new Delicious Restaurant and Time Management game.

name: The Legend of Ogorets 3: Kikimora
description: An interactive visual novel with choices, lore, and endgames. Reader beware.

name: Hot Noon
description: A local-coop party game that's all about the classical western stand-off. Draw faster than your opponents and prepare to catch their incoming bullets mid-air! Hot Noon is fast-paced and filled with tension. Are you skilled enough to outsmart your friends in this wits-filled stand-off?

name: Musical Dominotes
description: An educational tile-based board game, the Musical Dominotes, is a twist on the classic dominoes game, where the dots are replaced by musical notes and rests that represent certain time values.

name: 100 Rounds
description: A die and retry with 100 levels, simple gameplay and hours of rage quit.

name: Quiz Game Night
description: Quiz Game Night is a multiplayer trivia game for up to 10 players. Grab your friends, get any player-created pack from workshop and have a great game night!

name: Mononoke no Kuni
description: Through free village building and boat trips, this 3D open-world action game adds the fun of discovering and exploring unknown islands, as well as the tension and strategy of roguelite dungeon crawling!

name: GunDeck 100
description: GunDeck 100 is a lightning-fast twin-stick shooter where you’ll build your arsenal from randomly-dealt cards. Weapons fire in a rainbow of elements with unique effects. Dart and dodge to survive the fireworks unleashed against you, and retaliate with your own display! Can you survive to wave 100?

name: Prezzies
description: A colorful retro style matching game. Squash Prezzies and match splatter colors before time runs out.

name: Siege Showdown
description: "Siege Showdown" is an exciting strategy game that will give you the opportunity to defend a majestic fortress and fight with the troops of your opponents in a battle for power and territory. An exciting fantasy era world awaits you, where magic and powerful warriors merge in one battle.

name: Aerial Nature Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 2
description: Elevate your puzzle-solving journey to new heights as you explore Earth's wonders from above with this expansion.

name: Tulip
description: You are a very sad bunny. You cannot stop crying. You might have to drink something gross. You are Tulip. Wander through a storybook countryside, gather ingredients for a strange brew, and get to know your adorable animal neighbors in an odd quest to alleviate your incurable sadness.

name: No Recollection
description: A mystery visual novel following a boy who awoke in a strange building, with no recollection of where he is, how he arrived, why he's here, or how to leave. Discover the answers to these mysteries as you search for a way out. Meet a small but colorful cast in your journey, and escape together!

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Bonus Story: The Overlord, Demon Lord, and Sheltered Girl
description: Adds a story featuring the following 3 characters. Once completed, you gain them as playable characters and save icons.

name: Dreaminal
description: Dreaminal is a 1-4 players surreal backrooms experience. Traverse through immersive and unique backrooms levels, experience anomalies, interact and solve puzzles while hiding from unknown entities in order to escape from the mysterious world of The Backrooms .

name: PastoralPainting
description: PastoralPainting is a casual simulation, placement of hang-up + oil painting style healing system placement game. The breeze is quiet and the sun is fine! Let's get away from the hustle and bustle and enjoy a moment of idyllic beauty in the game.

name: Laruaville 8
description: Play Match 3 levels and build the town to turn anything into gold!

name: Pocket Pro Yakyuu
description: Sin descripción

name: Roots of Cinder
description: The doors of hell have been opened, and now demons walk the earth. Embark on an action-packed and mysterious adventure where you will have to confront the most dangerous enemies and solve the most intricate puzzles. All with the help of an extensive arsenal of weapons and summonings.

name: Q*bert
description: Will you master it or will it master you? Help Q*bert safely navigate his cube world by changing all the cubes to one colour whilst avoiding Coily the Snake and other enemies. Seem simple? Well don't underestimate the task of this challenging puzzle game that will test your skill and mental dexterity to the full. Special features include multiple power-ups, bonus rounds and hidden levels.

name: Cracking the Cryptic: Lines Variety Pack
description: A new variety pack featuring many different line variants!

name: Dark Mirror
description: "Dark Mirror" provides a visually stunning and atmospheric experience. The dark and gloomy environments attract players to a deep world of mystery, while the sound design of the game also increases the tension and excitement.

name: Star Racer
description: Compete to be the first, or only, racer to finish and become the fastest in the galaxy. Welcome to Star Racer! Get ready for a journey through time and space, where speed, skill, and sheer radness will determine the ultimate racer. Star Racer awaits - buckle up for the retro ride of a lifetime!

name: ColorCoordination
description: ColorCoordination is a puzzle game where you match colored blocks and spaces by moving them in unison. Explore deep, philosophical topics with your AI Assistant "CoCo" and discover more about its purpose - all while solving a myriad of colorful brainteasers!

name: Sapiens Craft Puzzle
description: Begin as a small stone age tribe. End as a global super power in a future age. Craft your way through history!

name: Infected: Super Soldier Project
description: A police officer goes to investigate an old house where he hears reports of noises and screams, a team was sent before him and they didn't give any feedback, something macabre awaits this police officer.

name: Taking Root: Academic Version
description: Join a stone creature and its loyal plant companion in an emotional journey to escape their once-pristine home, now suffocated by a concrete metropolis. Solve mind-bending puzzles by shifting perspectives as they flee together and find a new sanctuary to forever take root!

name: Interstellar Impact
description: Stylized single player adventure game. Explore the vastness of space, collide with smaller objects, avoid larger objects, grow until you explode and become a black hole and set the fastest time possible.

name: Ultimate Solitaire Collection
description: Over 300 game variants await, from classics favorites like Klondike to exclusive original solitaire creations. Customize your solitaire adventure with card sets, backgrounds, and more. Journey through diverse locations, unlocking treasures along the way. Join now and conquer the world of solitaire!

name: Made in Melostead
description: Return to your hometown to run your shop by fulfilling commissions and selling wares. Choose your path as a blacksmith, alchemist, or woodworker and revive Melostead as you befriend neighbors, reform trade routes, and explore the world for exotic materials in this fantasy-inspired crafting sim RPG!

name: Starheim
description: Starheim is a free to play spaceship piloting MMO set in a universe based on Norse mythology. Materials collected by destroying AI ships, other players, and mining asteroids can be used to upgrade your ship, with dozens of models to choose from on your journey from a small fighter to a dreadnought.

name: Zombie Girl
description: This is an extremely thrilling and challenging third-person shooter. If you like shooting games and Zombie Crisis, then this game must not be missed! It will give you an immersive gaming experience, immersing you in a world full of danger and mystery.

name: UnderOneRoof
description: This is a 10 minute short story game adapted from real events. Players will follow the perspective of the female protagonist, click on items or move through the prompts of the scene and tags, and experience this unexpected family upheaval.

name: FrozenPizza
description: Prepare to relive the golden era of FPS gaming while forging new friendships and creating unforgettable gaming memories. FrozenPizza serves up the best of both worlds in a visually stunning, community-driven adventure that will keep you hooked for hours.

name: Sausage vs. Vegetable
description: Sausage vs. Vegetable is a run-based roguelike with bullet heaven elements, following a band of outcast sausages to level up, loot, and fight their way to uncover the truths behind the vegetable invasion.

name: The Consumist Journey
description: The Consumist Journey is a surreal exploration game where you play as a strange character on a quest to explore the capitalist and consumerist paradigms of modern society. Navigate through bizarre and nonsensical environments, solve puzzles, and interact with eccentric characters.

name: Bardic: Quest for Love
description: Having just arrived in the great port city of Deepharbor, humble bards Edmond and Edna are suddenly tasked with running a Tavern. Recruit fellow adventuring heroes, manage your tavern, and possibly find romance? This is your Quest for Love!

name: Protocole: Hedera
description: You embody Hedera, a young test subject imprisoned in an inhumane experiment... Escape, free your fellow test subjects, use logic, draw on your empathy, control your emotions, and above all, use your psychic powers in this completely crazy action game!

name: It Happened Here: Beacon of Truth - Collector's Edition
description: Dive into a cold case of murder and betrayal at a lighthouse!

name: Dead Zone: Rebirth of Survivors
description: Dead Zone: Rebirth of Survivors is an FPS zombie-themed bullet hell game set in the Dead Zone universe. Use massive destruction guns to shred hordes of zombies! Improve your character with in-game improvements and skill tree training, and survive against bosses with various abilities.

name: Ascended Gods: Realm of Origins
description: Embark on an epic odyssey in Ascended Gods: Realm of Origins. Crafted by gods from their domains, floating realms await your exploration. Ascend in power, unveil secrets, and team up for dungeons, raids, and minigames. Unfold divine lore and become the most potent ascended god.

name: He Escaped
description: A horror roguelike that can be played solo or with up to 4 players locally and online. Find the hidden keys in randomly generated rooms and escape before the time runs out or you find something else...

name: Wildmagic Wizardry
description: Wildmagic Wizardry is a Spell Mixing strategy rogue-like. Combine elements rolled on magical dice into powerful spells to fight your way through different enemy encounters. Collect unique items along your journey that will enhance your abilities and ensure that no two runs are the same.

name: Tanked Out!
description: A local multiplayer tank showdown with multiple maps modes and customization that effects how you play.

name: Underground Defense Force: Sword and Sorcery and Swarm of Insects
description: Swarms of giant insects has appeared in the underground world "Agartha"! Defeat swarms of mutated insect monsters with multicast weapons/spells by your own party of customized characters! This is a casual SLG (SRPG) with a focus on exhilaration and hack-and-slash system.

name: The Leak
description: Wake up, watch tv, make a cup of cofffee and try to bear your own meaningless existence.

name: Escape from Death
description: "Escape from Death" is a 256,000-word interactive horror adventure novel by Tova Näslund. It's entirely text-based—without graphics or sound effects—and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.

name: Portal Puzzle
description: Sand flows and portals glow in this one-of-a-kind puzzle adventure

name: Fallen Seeds
description: As Evod, a special agent of the Earth Empire, you embark on a thrilling adventure to the enigmatic planet of Ulthar, inhabited by the zoomorphic tribe of the Flock, a biotechnological extraterrestrial civilization. Your mission is to unravel an ancient mystery that holds the key to your destiny.

name: Nudel Tag
description: In Nudel Tag, challenge your friends to get the most tips, in a crazy ramen restaurant ! Find up to 4 controllers, to have the most fun, and see who is the best waiter in the house !

name: Treasure Hunt Girl
description: This is a game to find hidden objects, in this cartoon world, there are many hidden props in the world, you need to find a handful of them.

name: Level Up Boxing VR
description: Eye of the tiger is on us! Fight your way to the top! Boxing the boxes has never been so much fun!

name: Evocation
description: A dark fantasy JRPG that focusses on equipment-based progression rather than leveling up. Explore, meet people, and simply survive in order to gain what you need to overcome the trials of the Goddess's temple.

name: DCop
description: Step into the gritty world of law enforcement in DCOP, a groundbreaking full motion video (FMV) police simulator that thrusts players into the heart-pounding action of a newly graduated police officer facing off against a ruthless criminal syndicate.

name: Neon Nirvana
description: Become a supercharged comet in a retro universe inspired by the '80s! Find the black hole, devour asteroids, and escape destruction in "Neon Nirvana".

name: Die, Pablo!
description: The world famous chef Louis is mad! He animates all sorts of inanimate objects to attack the restaurant critic Pablo for an alleged bad review of his restaurant. Luckily, Pablo likes playing tower defense games and knows exactly how to defend himself!

name: Mirrorscape
description: Mirrorscape is bringing the table back to virtual tabletops! Play around the table or around the world using authentic 3D terrain, miniatures, and environmental effects from top companies you know and love. Cross-play on iOS and Android devices using the magic of augmented reality!

name: Daily Thread: The Sewing of Discontent
description: Henrietta is a seamstress in early industrial Manchester, enjoying Victorian age manufactory work. Relive your favorite moments from Dickens, Zola, and Marx, learn about the history of working conditions and worker rights and how they got where they are today, and think of where they could still go!

name: Pirates Odyssey
description: Ahoy, mateys! We are marooned on a series of islands and need to find a way home. Help us explore the environment, build camps and find glorious booty. Join us on an island hopping adventure full of parrot wisdom, pirate mayhem and puzzle glory! Arrr!

name: Project Volition
description:
Clara is an Internet shut-in. But when her world is invaded by the web, she must come out and face the code.

Invited by her friends to an abandoned computer company building in their small town, Clara is faced with strange visual hallucinations and whispers of ascension through the cyber. Find clues, talk to your friends, and explore the glitch-warped building in Project Volition.

name: Singularium
description: Singularium is a High-Speed first person movement game where you create black holes to pull yourself around. Use the movement mechanics to their fullest and beat the levels as fast as possible!

name: Sea of Brave: Aidan Adventure
description: Sea of Brave - Aidan Adventure is an action-adventure platform game, explore the different levels of Figon Island to discover its mysteries, find treasures, challenges and new skills. Confront and defeat Captain Skull's fearsome pirate crew that has enslaved the island.

name: I Commissioned Some Cats 5
description: I paid artists to hide cats and wool in 15 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: I Commissioned Some Butterflies
description: I paid artists to hide butterflies and flowers in 15 artworks. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Reconnoitre
description: Unending nightfall has swept across the forest, sending all the animals fleeing from monstrous shapes in the dark! Collect and use charms and glyphs of power to make your way through the forest, reconnect villages and help towns-critters as you work to solve the cause of the nightfall.

name: Level Up Your Body
description: LUYB - Hit objects to the beat, dodge obstacles. Enhance strength, endurance, coordination, reflexes. Elevate in a virtual world.

name: Everbee
description: This is a game about managing a beehive. Collect resources from flowers to raise bees and expand the hive!

name: I Commissioned Some Frogs 2
description: I paid more artists to hide frogs and flies in 15 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Gravity Cab
description: Gravity Cab is a multi-platform 3D action-adventure-puzzler in which players take on the role of a flying taxi driver, transporting passengers and navigating challenging environments influenced by physics.

name: Luminis: Heal Them All
description: In an alternate universe set in the futuristic era, a strange kind of virus is wreaking havoc in the wild. Explore, survive and heal the sick with a wide range of resources, equipments and advanced technology. Restore the world from sickness to health.

name: Infection Crisis: Fight For Life
description: Welcome to Infection Crisis : Fight for life. This is without a budget survival game made by a single developer. A zombie apocalypse has happened in your country. Player must survive on this road.

name: Fallback!
description: Pixel art 2D shooter with a mix of basic Tower Defence.

name: Nested Lands
description: A ruthless settlement-survival RPG in a post-plague medieval world full of cruelty and despair. Gather survivors, build a settlement, craft, master your skills, survive, and endure alone or in online co-op.

name: Kwark
description: Kwark is a single player game about a creature that has to go through levels and then something impossible happens at the end! The game can be both from 1 person and from 3!

name: Animal Wars

name: I Commissioned Some Bees 13
description: I paid more artists to hide bees in 6 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Spooky.

name: Dice to Meet You
description: A cute, casual puzzle game that will challenge your spatial reasoning with every turn of the dice.

name: Two Moon: Space Rabbit
description: I didn't know what you'd like, so I brought six weapons from Earth. The items are as similar to those on Earth as possible. So will you grow stronger for me, or will you defeat me? Whatever you choose, it will play out as I expect.

name: Aethus
description: Aethus is a story-driven survival game with a low-poly isometric style and deep, systemic gameplay. Explore a futuristic underground world to mine and prospect for the valuable resources you need to build up your mining outpost, while unraveling a dystopian corporate conspiracy.

name: CoolPaintr VR: Voxel
description: Sin descripción

name: Peace Breaker
description: Simplistic mecha battling PC game.

name: Spell Slingin' Tower Defense
description: A game that combines the fun of custom spellcrafting with the monotony of a tower defense! Protect your hut with a vast arsenal of spells that you put into varyingly effective combinations.

name: Oberak
description: Oberak is a third-person Action Adventure RPG and Social School Sim mash-up, set in a Sci-Fantasy world with hip-hop influences. As a powerful Qi warrior, nurture your students, master skills from martial arts to crafting, and defend Ti-an from the deadly rogue clans that are on the rise.

name: Space Crab VS
description: Battle against other crabs with time tested arcade action! Form galactic partnerships and starlight rivalries in the story mode, or battle against other players locally with more than 20 unlockable crabs- some strange, some powerful.

name: Mr. Prospector Horiate-kun
description: In Mr. Prospector Horiate-Kun the player controls a dog that will have to dig through different mines to discover treasures and other objects.

name: Halloween Trouble 5
description: Halloween Trouble 5 is a Match 3 game that invites you to enter a spine-tingling world of mystery and excitement. Explore the haunted manor, solve eerie puzzles, and rescue your friends in this captivating match-3 adventure.

name: Plarail Yume Ga Ippai!
description: Toy set builder and train driving game developed and published by Tomy for the PlayStation 2 in Japan

name: Marsh
description: Face-off against wacky, cartoony, brought to life objects in this 2D platforming shooter! Challenge your cute squishy self to get the highest of scores, up the difficulties and find the many secrets.

name: Spaceport Trading Company
description: Players take on the role of a spacefaring merchant in a galaxy filled with diverse planets, each with its own economy, resources, and challenges. Amass wealth and reputation by trading goods, negotiating with factions, and navigating the intricacies of interstellar commerce.

name: Sparkhunt
description: Sparkhunt - is a classic 2.5D beat 'em up inspired by the games from the 90s with a complex combat system and the modern visuals. Let the grim ghost town be your arena.

name: Stop Burying Me Alive, Beautiful!
description: You wake up to your girlfriend burying you alive, and she won’t be convinced that you aren’t actually dead- one of several problems, it turns out, as you find yourself dealing with rats trying to take a few early bites out of you! And just who is the girl talking to you from underground?

name: Gateworlds
description: A nomadic colony sim with portals. Manage your settlers, explore strange new worlds through a mystical gate, and overcome the dangers you find there to succeed on the wild frontier of the Gateworlds.

name: Floating Girl
description: This is a casual masturbation girl game. You're flying a plane in space looking down on Earth when a bunch of alien spaceships fire at you. You have to survive. As a bonus, survive to the end, and you'll be able to see the floating girl. Head out into space!

name: Multiversal Affairs
description: Multiversal Affairs is an episodic physics-based pixel-art metroidvania/platformer/thing delightfully full of diverse creatures that try to live together in a society controlled by an autocratic government.

name: Puma: The Cat
description: Play as Puma, a cat on a quest to find her friend Mia. Explore challenging maps and confront enemies in this thrilling 2D pixel art platform game.

name: Boogeyman 3
description: Carrying a flashlight and water pistol, you must navigate a haunting bedroom to survive each nightmarish encounter. Utilise strategic defence, resource management, and cunning tactics to survive each night.

name: Pickleball Smash
description: Unleash Your Pickleball Fever! Get ready to serve, dink, and smash your way to victory in the thrilling world of Pickleball Smash. Compete across multiple venues, jump into challenging minigames, and play in competitive tournaments to become the best of the best.

name: Kingdom of Fallen: The Last Stand
description: Kingdom of Fallen is inspired by survival and souls-like games. Your mission is to gather clues of your missing daughter, using your own way to defeat fearsome bosses, through crafting or fighting, to reveal the secrets, and get out of this cursed kingdom.

name: Kero Kero Keroppi: Uki Uki Party Land
description: Kero Kero Keroppi: Uki Uki Party Land (けろけろけろっぴ ～ウキウキパーティーランド！！～) is a CD-ROM-based edutainment title for the Playdia console.

name: Wrestling Empire Forever
description: Sin descripción

name: Castle Master TD
description: Fortify, Strategize, and Conquer in our dynamic tower defense game. As master of your own castle, you’ll build powerful structures, plan strategic defences, and engage in epic battles against relentless enemies. Each choice you make shapes your kingdom’s destiny.

name: Bug Blazer
description: An Incremental idler/clicker mix with a variety of weapons and traps to achieve your goals. No prestige, and ever increasing progress, watch the numbers get ever larger to the point where the fabric of reality breaks down.

name: Idle Exorcism Hero
description: This is an idle turn-based combat game. While obtaining the best equipment, it doesn’t require too many operations.

name: The Whistle
description: Dave Wilson, a 20 year old adult who loves to go camping. Little did he know what would happen once he explored the forest of Harmony Hus Lake.

name: Fence
description: Fence is a Crime/Trading RPG set in The Bronx during the early 1990’s. You play as Jimmy, a recently expelled high schooler that’s trying to make ends meet while his alcoholic mother drinks her life away.

name: Lizard Slayer
description: Lizard Slayer - an arena shooter with roguelike elements. You will take on the role of an ancient Slavs and participate in real historical battles against lizards.

name: Forest Jump
description: This Game Is Simple. Reach your destination only by jumping and running.

name: The Adventures of Sir Kicksalot
description: A first-person action game that provides various ways for defeating your foes, whether through weaponry, magic, stealth, or clever tactics like kicking into deadly spikes.

name: Random Acts of Madness
description: Run for your life through the bright and stylish world of madness, rushing along the sky trail to rescue the precious Royal Offspring held within each increasingly difficult lair. It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart, so react quickly to the onslaught of obstacles that block your path forward in Random Acts of Madness!

name: Transilio
description: Retro-style frenzy awaits as you dash through demon-filled dungeons in this fast-paced top-down dungeon crawler.

name: Raster
description: Raster is a casual puzzle game about space. Here, you can use a variety of spatial abilities to traverse across diverse terrains, all in search of carrots for the bunny.

name: Macho Spinner
description: Spin into action in the arena as a whirlwind macho, sending all your opponents flying! "Macho Spinner" is a 3D arena combat game. Forge your mightiest macho and claim the championship of the Macho Spinner Cup!

name: My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom! - Pirates of the Disturbance: Day One Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Demon Island Massacre
description:
DEMON ISLAND MASSACRE is a hyper-8-bit-action platformer in a similar vein to arcade and 8-bit classics such as Ghosts n Goblins and Castlevania. Josh Baron and the crew at Polyanna Video invite you down a rabbit hole of sprawling colorful landscapes and twisted nightmare realms that bend the boundaries between 8-bit and 64-bit sensibilities. The priestess Flower Momogami must run, jump, and utilize an array of holy weaponry to overcome the demons that lurk every corner during the invasion of Tenryu, in the first chapter of this tale of Japanese-style horror.

Only challenge the road ahead if you dare!

name: Warrior Chef
description: Play as Mako, a Warrior Chef in a fantasy world of sentient food, chopping up foes for ingredients to cook new abilities in a 3D Hack and Slash about eating your way through four Food Kingdoms in a race to stop the spreading Rot.

name: Falling Day
description: Falling Day is an emotional, story-driven adventure game about coming of age and resolving supernatural mysteries. Two students become involved in several mysteries, murders, suicides, and paranormal incidents. The two must cooperate in order to discover the truth.

name: War Robots Shooting Simulator
description: Join the epic battle in deep space with War Robots Shooting Simulator! Create your robot hero, determine your strategy, and destroy enemies.

name: Enigma Station
description: Explore layers of deep future in Enigma Station, a Narrative-driven Adventure game. Delve into a mind-bending world, solve spatial puzzles using "Space Magic" and find your true self in a philosophical story inspired by themes of Transhumanism, Cosmic Consciousness, and Love.

name: Mossy Pixels
description: Destroy the mossy cover to reveal ancient drawings underneath! Watch the mysterious patterns get dissolved pixel-by-pixel and just... relax.

name: Glukhovo
description: Sometimes, regrets come too late. When you're over 40, you start to rethink your life. You remember people and events that completely changed you. I will tell you 7 stories that happened to me in childhood, after which I became a different person.

name: Survive: Forgotten and Abandoned
description: Survive: Forgotten and Abandoned is a first-person survival horror experience. Six months have passed since the outbreak. Haunted by his past, Stanley Bell must find a way to survive between hallucinations and monsters.

name: Maze Quest Master
description: "Embark on a thrilling journey in 'Maze Quest Master.' Conquer intricate mazes, collect coins, and master wall-bound movement. Become the ultimate maze explorer!"

name: Buff Huckem Fully Wrecked
description: A humorous action platformer. Fight through standard enemies and bosses using melee and short ranged combat as you platform through a world based in 90's cartoon style. Upgrade your abilities as you progress to become an unstoppable force of...gas.

name: Occultist Girl Magatsuhi
description: Sprite scaling shooting game, in which you play as a flying onmyouji.

name: Fwog
description: Frogs don't walk, and neither do fwogs! Hop, jump and swing your way through each stage in this unforgiving 2D-platformer. Be prepared to fall again and again and again as you slowly learn what it takes to fwog.

name: Days Of My Life
description: What is human destiny? Do our actions decide much in our fate? What if I told you that life can be lived in different ways? What if you had asked that girl out on a date and your life would have been different? Well, nothing can be returned…

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard Dear Days: Character Set 10 - Samuel Fredson
description: Set including Fighter "SAMUEL FREDSON" and sleeves.

description: Set including Fighter "JINKI MUKAE" and sleeves.

description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Shadow Strikers
description: In a city dominated by underworld organizations, street violence gives way to an unusual pact. "The Shadow Tournament". In Shadowhaven each organization chooses a champion to fight on its behalf, where victories bring power and influence. Get ready.

name: Project: Genesis
description: You wake up in a research facility and hear from the managing AI that humanity is in crisis due to an unknown virus. The AI requests that you conduct various experiments. Recognizing the dangers outside the facility, you decide to proceed with the experiments.

name: Core Keeper: Shimmering Frontier
description: Explore a glimmering new environment and discover a shining new Solarite ore, taking your Core Keeper experience to the next level with powerful new weapons, armour and equipment. Wield the powerful new Obliteration Ray, a destructive laser drill capable of mining through walls faster than any other equipment in the game, upgrade your gear for the very first time with the build-enhancing Upgrade Station, and take the fight to the Atlantean Worm, a colossal new boss lurking deep below the Sunken Sea.

Pilots can engage in intense dogfights and large-scale ground assaults across a variety of fast-paced, action-packed game modes and missions, and they will discover the pure adrenaline rush of dodging railguns and geothermal weapons, striking against mechanized fortresses, and skimming the ground with gatling guns and wing-mounted rocket launchers.

name: Flotsam Song
description:
Selinuntius, the last siren, has long lived apart from her kin after becoming stranded while looking for Persephone. Despite numerous attempts from the village on the shore to slay her, none have succeeded—her song has always reached those who come near her island eventually.

One day, a girl rows towards Selinuntius's island alone with an oar in injured hands and a smile on her face. What Selinuntius first believed was her effortlessly luring another victim morphs into the realization that the girl, Melos, could never hear her song in the first place—

name: Race Drivin' a Go! Go!
description: Race Drivin' a Go! Go! is an updated remake of the 1990 coin-op racing game of the same title. It features the original Hard Drivin' course, the courses added in the original Race Drivin', and three brand new courses only found in this new version. The number of available vehicles has also increased from 3 to 8. The game includes both a single-player championship mode and an arcade time attack mode.

description: Toraware no Shoujo is a freeware horror-adventure game. It follows the story of Ai, a girl caged in the attic of her house by her father, and her attempts to escape.

name: Illusions
description:
An unreleased Intellivision title from 1983

The enchanted mirror splits you into multiple images. You must become whole before time runs out. Changing stairways and folding cubes with SuperGraphics try to keep you from safety.

name: Game Factory
description:
An unreleased Intellivision title made in 1984.

Now you can create your own video games without having to do all the work. Because our Game Maker comes with the graphics and game play already designed for you. You choose from a library of characters, backgrounds and gameplay, then create your own custom video game. You can even plug any regular Intellivision game cartridge into the system to borrow your favorite Intellivision characters! Requires the ECS Computer Adaptor.

name: The Bunny Graveyard: Chapter 1 - The Bunny Garden
description: The Bunny Garden is the first of 5 chapters planned for the horror adventure game, The Bunny Graveyard.

name: Red Book
description: Red Book is a RPG Maker horror game. Play as Alice, a girl who took refuge in an old house in the forest when it started to rain. However, something darker seems to be hidden in that house...

name: Go for the Gold
description: An unreleased album cartridge of four previously released games with a 1984 Sarajevo Olympic license. Games would have included Skiing, Hockey, Boxing and Basketball. In 1998 its prototype menu screen was included on the Intellivision Lives! CD.

name: Mr. BASIC Meets Bits 'N Bytes
description: An introduction to computers and BASIC programming through the fun of a video game. Control "Mr. BASIC" and capture the "Bits" and "Bytes" in one of three exciting games. Learn to write simple programs on the Computer Keyboard. Or, use the hand controllers just for fun. These programs use our unique color-coded graphics system to make learning programming as easy as a game.

name: Motocross
description: Motocross is a bike racing game for one player against the clock, one player against the computer, or two players. Included are three different racetracks of varying lengths, each with many twists, turns, and even some jumps. Be careful when racing, or you could skid off the track on a sharp turn or crash after a poorly timed jump! You can also use the track editor to create your own track to race on. For each race, you can choose anywhere from one to ten laps to be completed.

name: Melody Blaster
description: The musical version of the popular video game, Astrosmash. And a fun, new way to learn musical notation. As musical notes fall from the sky in the pattern of a popular song, you must play the right keys to shoot them down. The faster you shoot down the notes, the faster you're learning to play your favorite songs! Requires ECS Music Synthesizer

name: Hard Hat
description:
An unreleased Intellivision title from 1984.

Place your workman on the floor where the center moving scaffold is. Run to the scaffold and your workman will jump from the building to the scaffold. Pick up a pane of glass and move it into place. Complete your building before your opponent does. If your opponent is getting ahead of you, do not fret; run over to his building and knock off his panes! Programmers at Mattel Electronics came up with a series of casual games meant to be played at parties. The "Party Line" cartridge was shown at the 1984 CES but never produced.

name: Number Jumble
description:
An unreleased Intellivision title from 1983

Cut across fire in a Time Sailer, cruise under water in a Submarine, fly through thin air in a Zeppelin, or roll across the Earth in a Tank -- but never stop firing at the dreadful creatures that beset you! Shoot them down with the fireballs you control and they'll turn into black numbers. When you shoot enough creatures, you get a chance to solve exciting mathematical equations...and score big points! Hurry, for every second counts! Have fun! 1 or 2 players. 1 little man under your control when the game starts, 4 more in reserve. 4 different environments to choose from! Simple to more complex equations. Both "scratch pad" and "solution" areas to work on. Choose from 48 skill levels. Transport Houses found in every environment to give you bonus multipliers. Progressive scoring setup, according to your skill level and speed in solving equations. Automatic transfer to a higher level once you've mastered the one you're on!

name: Spina the Bee
description:
An unreleased Intellivision title from 1983

Summer time and there is need to pollinate the roses and sunflowers! You have been ordered by the queen of the hive to collect pollen. Careful on your journey though. You will have to brave a harsh environment that contains spiders, dragon flies, water puddles and rain drops. Succeed and you will return to the bee hive to collect your reward and rating by the queen.

name: The Legend of Legacy HD Remastered: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Bunny Graveyard: Chapter 2 - Terror in Carrot Town
description:
Terror in Carrot Town is the working title for Chapter 2 of the horror adventure game, The Bunny Graveyard.

Chapter 2 has started development and will follow Skye the Bunny with a different moveset and more gameplay options then the previous chapter. Plans are for the story to get darker but still have wacky moments and fun minigames throughout a more connected world map with a less linear path through the story.

name: Trick or Treat
description:
Also known as Street or Halloween Street, Trick or Treat was an unreleased game for the Intellivision from 1983

Go trick-or-treating; get candy from houses where the lights are on. Avoid the witches, ghosts and pumpkins.

name: Takeover
description:
An unreleased Intellivision title from 1982

Takeover is a strategy game where the objective is to capture your opponent's capital city. This is accomplished by a coordinated effort of the armies, fleets, cities and roads at the player's disposal. The game is played with five different scenarios and randomly situated capital cities which form constraints to each player's basic strategy.

name: Spirit of the Island: Paradise Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Rocky & Bullwinkle
description:
An unreleased Intellivision game from 1983.

Math mode to this game. "Rocky and Bullwinkle must stop the evil Boris and Natasha from robbing a train full of priceless valuables. While Boris uses "Upsidasium" to float the valuables up to Natasha's waiting helicopter, Rocky must fly around and intercept them. When Rocky catches the valuables, he gives them to Bullwinkle for safe keeping."

name: AdoraBullet
description:
Join Rae Stellaris in an epic quest through the cosmos in this cutesy, Game Boy-inspired bullet hell. As the daughter of legendary Lunaheim galactic soldiers who died protecting the planet in a fight against Emperor Quack, Rae’s destiny is to destroy Emperor Quack to avenge her parents and keep her home planet Lunaheim safe.

Rae Stellaris is the daughter of Legendary Lunaheim galactic soldiers who lost their lives in a fight trying to defeat Emperor Quack. Following in her parents' footsteps, Rae trained for four years in the galactic bootcamp and earned the rank of Corporal. After her promotion, Rae is demanded for the mission to defeat Emperor Quack alone. Her superiors knew it was a suicide mission, but due to Rae’s tenacity and determined righteousness, they let her go with the fate of Lunaheim in her hands.

Made for GBJam 11.

name: Brett Hull NHL Hockey
description: Brett Hull NHL Hockey is an unfinished game for the Atari Jaguar. A beta build of the cartridge version of Brett Hull NHL Hockey was released by B&C Computervisions on January 9, 2004 for US$50. Brett Hull NHL Hockey is a ice hockey game that is played from a vertical perspective in a two-dimensional environment with sprites. Most of the rules from the sport are present in the title, though they can be disabled from the menu and in-game options. Some of the gameplay options found within the game include an exhibition match, regular season and playoff competitions, among other modes of play. The announcer, Al Michaels, makes commentary during gameplay and announces Brett Hull by name but other players are only called by their respective jersey number due to the lack of the NHL license, while his commentaries can also be turned off on the options menu. Season progress is only kept via password and there is also a two-player option for every mode.

name: Arena Football '95
description: Arena Football '95 is an unreleased arena football video game that was in development by V-Real Interactive and planned to be published by Atari Corporation on a scheduled August 1995 release exclusively for the Atari Jaguar. If it had been released before Midway Games' Kurt Warner's Arena Football Unleashed, it would have been the first officially licensed indoor american football game by the Arena Football League. Adopting the more faster and frantic style of play from the sport compared to american football, players would have the choice of playing across any of the game modes available against with either CPU-controlled opponents or other players, while including all the rules and teams from the 1995 Arena Football League season including the Miami Hooters, who make their only game appearance in the title and were not included in Electronic Arts' Arena Football. Originally conceived in 1993, the game was announced in early 1994 and showcased at SCES '94 but the project would be later cancelled in 1995 after various delays and expenses, despite being close to completion. Although unreleased, a playable prototype has since been released and sold online by independent groups such as the defunct Jaguar Sector II website and later B&C Computervisions.

name: Zzyorxx II
description: Zzyorxx II is an unreleased arcade-style scrolling shooter game similar to Axelay and Life Force where players take control of two distinct spacecraft through five stages set across different time periods, each one featuring their own thematic and alternating between horizontal and vertical scrolling, while fighting against enemies and bosses.

name: Virtual VCS
description:
An unreleased Atari 2600 game compilation for the Atari Jaguar. It contains:

-Combat
-Pac Man
-Adventure
-Yar's Revenge
-Defender
-Berzerk

name: Thea Realm Fighters
description: A cancelled fighting game for the Atari Jaguar. It was developed by High Voltage Software, but never released officially.

name: Native
description: A DAZZLING GAME OF COSMIC ENCOUNTER! The final showdown has begun! At the controls of your powerful interstellar craft, you maneuver into enemy territory. Your mission: to destroy the evil forces who have held the cosmos in fear and relentless suffering. It's a fight to death against an uncommon cadre of space oddities - gigantic slithering serpents, whirling space bugs and fantastic galactic warships. Can you endure the onslaught in the Atari Jaguar's finest 2D shoot'em up? The fate of the cosmos is in your hands... Horizontal and vertical scrolling in 60 frames per Second! Transparency and lightning effects show the power of the Jaguar! Over 100 objects simultaneous on screen - a shooter's nightmare!

name: Phase Zero
description: Phase Zero is an unreleased action-shooter video game that was in development by Hyper Image Productions and originally planned to be published by Atari Corporation on a scheduled September 1995 release date exclusively for the Atari Jaguar. It was the only game in development by Hyper Image. Assuming the role of a newcomer pilot from the titular squadron assigned to fight against an rival organization only known as The Collective in a foreign planet, players take control of a windowless VTV hovertank craft called Hunter in order to complete a series of missions and tasks, while battling against enemy VTV hovertanks. Hyper Image was originally working on a top-down shooter for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System, before the team later moved to the Jaguar with Phase Zero and opted to use their own interpretation of the heightmap technique to render the landscapes and visuals, in addition of also placing emphasis on LAN play for multiplayer.

name: Tiny Toon Adventures: Plucky Duck in Hollywood Hijinks
description: An unreleased game for the Atari Jaguar.

name: Slam Racer
description: An unreleased racing game for the Atari Jaguar.

name: Jack Nicklaus Cyber Golf
description: An unreleased game for the Atari Jaguar.

name: D-List Diva
description: A free comedy point-and-click adventure game about a misanthropic tour manager and a washed-up singer's rider demands

name: Remnants of Skystone
description: Remnants of Skystone was a 2D side-scrolling platformer in a steampunk post-apocalyptic setting with multiplayer elements. Players could play as one of the three playable classes (Aeronaut, Crag or Ferric), each with different abilities, and travel to different parts of Nidaria or Etherea. Missions and Quests were the main single-player elements and Trailblazing was the main multiplayer element.

name: Intellivania
description: Intellivania (stylized IntelliVania) is an action-adventure platformer video game developed by Matthew Kiehl for the Intellivision. It is a demake of Castlevania for the Nintendo Entertainment System. It was first released as part of the Intellivision Revolution project in 2020, and later sold separately in digital ROM format.

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Season Pass
description:
This set includes the following DLC:
- Bonus Story: The Overlord, Demon Lord, and Sheltered Girl
- Bonus Story: The Hothead, Princess, and Dreamer
- Bonus Story: The Honor Student, Final Boss, and Ex-President
- Bonus Story: The Instructor, Steward, and Fallen Angel of Love
- Bonus Story: The Kind Demon, Singing Princess, and Thief Angel
- Bonus Story: The Zombie Sibs and Angel Little Sister
- Bonus Story: The Delinquent, Curry Lover, and Lady Overlord
- Pleinair Completion Bonus

name: Harvest Moon: The Winds of Anthos - Visitors From Afar Pack
description: A new chapter, new characters, and even a new bachelor and bachelorette await you in the Visitors From Afar Pack! The Verne Trading Company has arrived and is eager to set up business! But starting any new business can be challenging! What kind of unforeseen bottlenecks await your new guests? Will they see a return on investment, or are they destined to stay in the red? Help them launch their new brand all across Anthos!

name: Monster Hunter Rise: DLC Pack 9
description: Sin descripción

name: Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! - Maimai DX + Ongeki Pack
description:
A new pack featuring 10 songs, navigators, and avatars from "maimai DX" and "Ongeki"!
A DLC pack for Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! that includes 10 songs, navigators, and avatars from "maimai DX" and "Ongeki"!

name: Johnny Trigger: Avenger Edition
description: In this bundle you get content from the base game and Avenger DLC.

name: Hentai World: Platinum Edition
description: In this bundle, you will meet student Sayuri and Akane in her new foxy look.

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Superb Edition
description:
Coloring books are a great way to spend your time. It is a good way to settle the nerves and relax! It also develops your brain... just like eating fish. Use one of the premade templates or create YOUR OWN illustrations.

Pick one of over a dozen drawings and make it your own. Chose one of the available settings and play around with these adorable characters.

This bundle lets you try out the new whiteboard set and drawings.

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Costumes Set
description: Adds a set of 7 unique character costumes (from previous games in the series).

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Includes the following:
- Disgaea 7 game
- Cosmetic Set
- Special Weapons Set
- Starter Support Set

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Complete Edition
description:
Includes the following:
- Disgaea 7 game
- Cosmetic Set
- Special Weapons Set
- Starter Support Set
- Season Pass

name: Cooking Arena: 6 in 1 Edition
description: This bundle contains "Food Truck Tycoon", "Sweet Bakery Tycoon", "Food Truck Tycoon - Asian Cuisine", "Burger Chef Tycoon", "Breakfast Bar Tycoon" and "Pizza Bar Tycoon".

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Cosmetic Set
description:
This set includes the following DLC:
- Glasses Costumes Set
- Disgaea Costumes Set
- Magical Girl Magic Knight & Spirit Costumes
- Charming Prinny & Slumber Cat Costumes
- Short-Hair Succubus & Felynn Costumes
- Animal Ear Armor Knight & Witch Costumes
- Gamer Professor & Mecha Girl Costumes
- Nurse Kunoichi & Cleric Costumes
- Oni & Kappa Prinny Costumes

name: Crowd City: Complete Edition
description:
Gather people across the city and beat your opponents with your excellent leadership. The more people you run into, the bigger your crowd becomes!

Complete Edition Features:
- 7 maps to run on
- 40+ skins to make your crowd look even cooler
- Additional 2000 coins
- Crowd upgrades
- Amusing gameplay
- Ear-catching music
- Easy controls so anyone can play
- Simple rules and lots of fun!

name: Aquapark io: Complete Edition
description:
Complete Edition Features:
- 15 large maps with slides
- 50+ funny skins, 11 floaties, 13 gliders
- multiplayer mode up to 4 players on one screen!
- opening packs with random skins
- spawning mysterious powerups during the game
- catchy holiday music
- easy controls so anyone can play
- simple rules and lots of fun!

name: High on Life: DLC Bundle
description: High On Life and High On Knife: two great tastes that go great together!

name: Dinobreak Killer Crisis Collection
description: Two retro survival horror nightmares overflowing with dinosaurs and zombies!

name: Turn-Based Battle Bundle: The Amazing American Circus & Legend of Keepers
description: Get two awesome turn-based games: The Amazing American Circus and Legend of Keepers!

name: Uncontained
description: Uncontained is a online co-op horror game where players will fight to survive against MUT. Strategies plans as a team and execute accordingly, A Random player will be given control of MUT to seek you out and kill you off one by one

name: Shrapnel
description: Shrapnel is the newest first-person extraction shooter, developed by BAFTA and Emmy award-winning game industry veterans at NEON. SHRAPNEL has a rich set of player-creation tools, combining creation, curation, and connection into a game where players own the platform.

name: Monsters of Mican
description: Welcome to Mican! Explore a hand-crafted series of dungeons in this first person party based RPG (Blobber) inspired by classics such as Might and Magic and Wizardry. Can you put a stop to the monsters' mysterious plan and discover the ancient secrets of the Amalgam Anomaly?

name: 90 Minute Fever
description: 90 Minute Fever is an online football management game that offers extremely challenging gameplay where you get to compete against others from all over the world!

name: Fights in Tight Spaces: Complete Edition
description: Fights in Tight Spaces: Complete Edition

name: Extreme Offroad Racing
description: Extreme Offroad Racing is ultimate 3D Offroad Racing game for all age group. There are 10 Racing Challenges in which player has to face different hurdles and difficulties to complete that challenge.

name: Animal Hospital
description: Young animal lovers are warmly invited to come and discover the fascinating world of Animal Hospital. Put on your vet gear and get ready to save all the animals coming through the doors of your hospital. Soon you will learn everything there is to know about species from all four corners of the world!

name: Talisman: Digital Edition - 40th Anniversary Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Mario & Luigi: Superstar Saga
description: The remaster of Mario & Luigi: Superstar Saga included in Mario & Luigi: Superstar Saga + Bowser's Minions.

name: Mario & Luigi: Bowser's Inside Story
description: The remaster of Mario & Luigi: Bowser's Inside Story released in Mario & Luigi: Bowser's Inside Story + Bowser Jr.'s Journey.

name: Trojan
description: A true classic, Trojan was the first total conversion for Marathon. Trojan features 25 levels with all new artwork, weapons, enemies, and music.

name: Train Valley Collection
description: Embark on a lighthearted rail journey with our Train Valley Collection! This exclusive package brings together the classic Train Valley: Console Edition and its sequel, Train Valley 2: Community Edition. Jump aboard and transfer between these two fantastic management and puzzle experiences. Travel from the real-world stations of the first Train Valley to the thrilling landscapes of Train Valley 2. It's a bundled ticket for double the excitement and twice the train-routing fun. Get ready to navigate the tracks and explore the unique challenges that await this extraordinary train adventure. All aboard for a bundled ride you won't want to miss!

name: Train Valley Collection: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Tempus Irae
description: In Tempus Irae the player travels back in time... to Renaissance Italy. Tempus Irae was created to be a FUN scenario to play, filled with mouth watering eye candy, and plenty of ammo to accomplish the tasks at hand.

name: Phoenix
description: A 35-level single player major conversion, Marathon: Phoenix is difficult and action-packed. Marathon: Phoenix features a full arsenal of new, powerful weapons, and more threatening enemies than you could ever want.

name: Yuge
description:
Mararthon: Yuge is a 30-level scenario, plus 225 secret levels for extra gameplay.
Full of inside jokes, procedurally generated levels, and minimalist textures, Mararthon: Yuge combines serious Marathon 2-style combat with an irreverent setting.

name: Evil
description: Marathon: EVIL, the first conversion for Marathon Infinity, was long regarded as one of the scariest and finest. Marathon: EVIL features a few new weapons and monsters.

name: Ride 5: Day One Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Ace Robot Combat
description: Take command in Ace Robot Combat, piloting mighty mechs on a quest for glory and vengeance in a futuristic world dominated by colossal war robots.

name: Airship Defender
description: Airship Defender is a game of air defense, we try to grow our airship and protect it from enemies. Well of course the enemies are experienced, they come at us in waves and attack us, and worse, the bosses!

name: Family Games
description: Are you looking for some fun and educational games for your family? Look no further than the Family Games Bundle, a collection of four amazing games that will keep you and your kids entertained for hours.

name: Dungeons and Goblins
description: Small Hero, Big Adventures - Craft Your Destiny!

name: Detail Detective
description: Can you spot all differences and conquer the world of details?

name: 4x4 Mud: Offroad Car Simulator & Truck
description: Sin descripción

name: Bratz: Flaunt Your Fashion - Complete Edition
description: Bratz: Flaunt Your Fashion - Complete Edition offers a thrilling fashion adventure! Customize your favorite Bratz character, explore Stilesville and beyond. Complete quests, play bratitude-filled minigames, and chase the most significant stories while creating the ultimate fashion magazine. Includes Girls Nite Out and Pretty ‘N' Punk Fashion Packs.

name: Terminator: Resistance - Complete Edition
description: Terminator: Resistance - Complete Edition bundles an enhanced version of Terminator: Resistance with the Annihilation Line Narrative Expansion and Infiltrator Mode in one complete package.

name: Terminator: Resistance - Complete Edition: Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Broforce: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Balloon Invasion
description: You are the commander of the anti-air defense in the area. The enemy is invading from the open sea with enormous battle groups of bomb-armed balloons. Win battles, gain experience, level up and use your commander points to gain access to upgrades and various weapons. The fate of your country is in your hands. Good luck, Commander!

name: Black Sails
description: Three great naval countries have been fighting each other to gain control over the Caribbean’s for many years. With none of the sides being able to settle the score, the battle has brought nothing but chaos and disarray to the region. It is up to you to take part in this epic battle and bring the opposing countries finally to their knees.

name: GalaxiA: Pilot Episode
description:
GalaxiA is a space adventure, inspired by classic Sci-Fi series and Japanese Adventure Games. The Pilot Episode is the first instalment of the episodic saga.

Follow the crew of the FSS Helen Thari to all corners of known space to rebuild civilizations, heal baleful wounds and reconnect with those lost in the dark. Explore a brand new universe and unveil forgotten dangers, new conspiracies and future enemies!

name: Builders Brawl
description: Builders Brawl is the ultimate turn based artillery game, featuring 35 power-packed weapons! Try to take down the opposing team on various landscapes throughout the campaign mode, or try your hand at the deathmatch mode. Inspired by the iconic Worms series.

name: Cosmic Caverns
description: Xbox Live indie game.

name: Anomaly Collapse
description: Command a squad of adorably fierce warriors in Anomaly Collapse, a turn-based Roguelite strategy game that offers a fresh twist to an old formula! Face off against otherworldly beings and uncover the dark secrets of supernatural calamities. Immerse yourself in a story where every move counts!
